title: Serge Mouille Three - Arm Wall Lamp Black
body: Minimalist yet brimming with creativity, the Serge Mouille Wall Lamp, by Mobelaris, is a shining example of the sophisticated, thoughtful light fixtures of the 20th century. A high end style that expresses the originality and elegance of the original design, our version is made with Lacquered tapered iron and hand-polished in black finish and brass details.
